channel.title: Comments on: iPhone 5 Has Diagonal Swipe Glitch May Affect Apps

item.title: By: charlesmckeever
item.dc:creator: charlesmckeever
item.description: I don't know if this issue will affect anyone using the Corona SDK, but in the interest of saving a developer a few hours of valuable life, I thought we'd include it anyway :)
item.content:encoded: I don’t know if this issue will affect anyone using the Corona SDK, but in the interest of saving a developer a few hours of valuable life, I thought we’d include it anyway ðŸ™‚
